kobe.KBtelescope.telescope¶

class kobe.KBtelescope.telescope(logger=None, **kwargs)¶

telescope: define the name and a pointing list for one telescope inherient from tilings and galaxies

Parameters
strategystr

options: T, G T generate a tiling network G generate a list of galaxies

See also

kobe.tilings, kobe.galaxies

Examples

see also https://github.com/saberyoung/kobe/blob/master/notebook/test_tilings.ipynb
